name: Level Riser
description:
In level riser, surviving is the most important thing. Deep in space, with only your space ship to protect you, you'll have to face the asteroids coming your way and evade them for as long as you can. Think this is easy? Think twice...

This is another university project (2022), a really small one. The goal was to learn how to save scores with SQLite and save data files with json.

You can find me on Twitter, Instagram and Twitch.
